# ddBlog Application

----------

**The project is generated by [LoopBack](http://loopback.io).**

## Install and Run

* You must have `node` and `git` installed.
* `git clone https://github.com/dopeddude/lb3-starter.git`
* `cd lb3-starter`
* `npm run submoduleupdate`
* `npm run setup`
* `npm start`
